shoes.name: Boots
shoes.description: Covers the foot and the ankle and extends up the leg.

shoes.name: High Heels
shoes.description: Raised heels, by 2 inches (5 cm) above the toes, commonly worn by women for formal occasions or social outings.

shoes.name: Mules
shoes.description: No fitting around the heel (i.e. they are backless).

shoes.name: Flip Flops
shoes.description: Type of sandal typically worn as a form of casual wear. They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by a Y-shaped strap that passes between the first and second toes and around both sides of the foot.
